title: Riot deleting my post becuase they banned me for bs reasons
body:
check the log they sent me in the reform card! mind you im getting flamed by the ezreal mid the whole time and didnt flame back


Game 1
GrabMeTrump: new pings?
GrabMeTrump: np
GrabMeTrump: not close enough
GrabMeTrump: theyre going drake
GrabMeTrump: take my camps
GrabMeTrump: gotcha
GrabMeTrump: enjoy mid
GrabMeTrump: you failed to relize idc what you have to say anymore
GrabMeTrump: akali you wont see me mid anymore enjoy man
GrabMeTrump: no im tilted this guy is flaming me for no reason
GrabMeTrump: takes my raptors....talks shittt to me ults my gromp....talks shitt to me...yea man tell them youve been flaming me
GrabMeTrump: and i camped you from getting further behind from akali stfu man youve been flaming me this whole game
GrabMeTrump: you were gonna flame me no matter what! i shouldve let you gwet shitted on by akali
GrabMeTrump: now youre not flam ing me lul
GrabMeTrump: AHAHAHA one my asss
GrabMeTrump: go back and read
GrabMeTrump: i dont need to
GrabMeTrump: riot will tell you what you said for your chat ban
GrabMeTrump: enjoy
GrabMeTrump: stay salty bud
GrabMeTrump: yea im the toxic one ahahaha this guy is a joke starts flaming me and i say enjoy mid and he flames me again now hes tryi9ng to act like he has flamed me
GrabMeTrump: yea report me riot will seee the chat im not worried
GrabMeTrump: yea report me
GrabMeTrump: says its tilting after flames me the whole game ahahahah im dead
GrabMeTrump: but she didnt did she
GrabMeTrump: lmao this ezreal is salty af i love it
GrabMeTrump: ahahahahahahahaha
